content: the crocheting guidance available as following part 1 https //youtu be/yqoq6hkbchw part 2 https //youtu be/kppls7ee4sm the **yarn kit** link coming soon please stay tuned for updates this cardigan is available in two versions lace and merino the **lace style** is crafted using susan s family #3 lace yarn resulting in a skin-friendly and refreshing finish perfect for wearing during the spring and summer seasons the **merino style** uses a strand of susan s family velvetmerino and a strand of mohair held together providing a plush texture that is warm and comfortable ideal for autumn and spring wear you can freely choose between **long sleeves** or **short sleeves** based on your needs the short-sleeved version can be worn with a base layer appearing fashionable and youthful the long-sleeved style can serve as a cardigan offering everyday comfort the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project and we hope that during the process you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used more product can be found in this account please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you d like to know immediately when there s anew video up
